mapper.select: select DISTINCT ename,entrz_gene,`type` from enzyme where `type`=#{type} and del=1 and ename IN (select ename from enzyme_metabolites where mname=#{data.mname} and del=1 and `type`=#{type})

select DISTINCT pname,gene_symbol,eg_id,upkb,`type` from proteins where `type`=#{type} and del=1 and gene_symbol in (select pname from protein_enzyme where `type`=#{type} and del=1 and re_type=2 and pname_e in (#{item.ename}) )
select dname,drugbank from drugs where `type`=#{type} and del=1 and dname in ( select dname from drug_protein where `type`=#{type} and del=1 and pname in (#{item.gene_symbol}) )
select dname,pname,`type` from drug_protein where `type`=#{type} and del=1 and dname in (#{drug.dname}) and pname in (#{protein.gene_symbol})
select pname,pname_e,type from protein_enzyme where re_type=1 and type=#{type} and del=1 and pname in (#{protein.gene_symbol}) and pname_e in (#{protein.gene_symbol})
select pname,pname_e,type from protein_enzyme where re_type=2 and type=#{type} and del=1 and pname in (#{protein.gene_symbol}) and pname_e in (#{enzyme.ename})
select ename,mname,type from enzyme_metabolites where type=#{type} and del=1 and ename in (#{enzyme.ename}) and mname=#{data.mname}
